body:
<!-- **Are you in the right place?**
1. For issues or feature requests, please create an issue in this repository.
2. For general technical and non-technical questions, we are happy to help you on our [Rook.io Slack](https://slack.rook.io/).
3. Did you already search the existing open issues for anything similar? -->

**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**

```
$ kubectl describe pod rook-ceph-nfs-mynfs-a-5d7d946d68-2zk7l
Name:               rook-ceph-nfs-mynfs-a-5d7d946d68-2zk7l
Namespace:          rook-ceph
Priority:           0
PriorityClassName:  <none>
Node:               kubic-2/192.168.122.199
Start Time:         Wed, 08 May 2019 17:20:22 +0200
Labels:             app=rook-ceph-nfs
                    ceph_nfs=mynfs
                    instance=a
                    pod-template-hash=5d7d946d68
                    rook_cluster=rook-ceph
Annotations:        <none>
Status:             Pending
IP:                 10.244.2.19
Controlled By:      ReplicaSet/rook-ceph-nfs-mynfs-a-5d7d946d68
Init Containers:
  config-init:
    Container ID:  
    Image:         rook/ceph:master
    Image ID:      
    Port:          <none>
    Host Port:     <none>
    Args:
      ceph
      nfs
      init
    State:          Waiting
      Reason:       CreateContainerError
    Ready:          False
    Restart Count:  0
    Environment:
      ROOK_COPY_BINARIES_PATH:    /rook
      ROOK_CLUSTER_NAME:          rook-ceph
      ROOK_MON_ENDPOINTS:         <set to the key 'data' of config map 'rook-ceph-mon-endpoints'>  Optional: false
      ROOK_ADMIN_SECRET:          <set to the key 'admin-secret' in secret 'rook-ceph-mon'>        Optional: false
      ROOK_PRIVATE_IP:             (v1:status.podIP)
      ROOK_PUBLIC_IP:              (v1:status.podIP)
      ROOK_CEPH_CONFIG_OVERRIDE:  /etc/rook/config/override.conf
    Mounts:
      /etc/ceph from ceph-default-config-dir (rw)
      /etc/rook/config from rook-config-override (rw)
      /rook from rookbinaries (rw)
      /var/lib/rook from rook-data (rw)
      /var/log/ceph from rook-ceph-log (rw)
      /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount from default-token-7ppbb (ro)
Containers:
  ceph-nfs:
    Container ID:  
    Image:         ceph/daemon-base:latest-master
    Image ID:      
    Port:          <none>
    Host Port:     <none>
    Command:
      /rook/tini
    Args:
      --
      /rook/rook
      ceph
      nfs
      run
    State:          Waiting
      Reason:       PodInitializing
    Ready:          False
    Restart Count:  0
    Environment:
      CONTAINER_IMAGE:     ceph/daemon-base:latest-master
      POD_NAME:            rook-ceph-nfs-mynfs-a-5d7d946d68-2zk7l (v1:metadata.name)
      POD_NAMESPACE:       rook-ceph (v1:metadata.namespace)
      NODE_NAME:            (v1:spec.nodeName)
      POD_MEMORY_LIMIT:    node allocatable (limits.memory)
      POD_MEMORY_REQUEST:  0 (requests.memory)
      POD_CPU_LIMIT:       node allocatable (limits.cpu)
      POD_CPU_REQUEST:     0 (requests.cpu)
      ROOK_CEPH_NFS_NAME:  a
    Mounts:
      /etc/ceph from ceph-default-config-dir (rw)
      /etc/ganesha from ganesha-config (rw)
      /rook from rookbinaries (rw)
      /var/lib/rook from rook-data (rw)
      /var/log/ceph from rook-ceph-log (rw)
      /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount from default-token-7ppbb (ro)
Conditions:
  Type              Status
  Initialized       False 
  Ready             False 
  ContainersReady   False 
  PodScheduled      True 
Volumes:
  rook-data:
    Type:       EmptyDir (a temporary directory that shares a pod's lifetime)
    Medium:     
    SizeLimit:  <unset>
  ceph-default-config-dir:
    Type:       EmptyDir (a temporary directory that shares a pod's lifetime)
    Medium:     
    SizeLimit:  <unset>
  rook-config-override:
    Type:      ConfigMap (a volume populated by a ConfigMap)
    Name:      rook-config-override
    Optional:  false
  rook-ceph-log:
    Type:          HostPath (bare host directory volume)
    Path:          log
    HostPathType:  
  ganesha-config:
    Type:      ConfigMap (a volume populated by a ConfigMap)
    Name:      rook-ceph-nfs-mynfs-a
    Optional:  false
  rookbinaries:
    Type:       EmptyDir (a temporary directory that shares a pod's lifetime)
    Medium:     
    SizeLimit:  <unset>
  default-token-7ppbb:
    Type:        Secret (a volume populated by a Secret)
    SecretName:  default-token-7ppbb
    Optional:    false
QoS Class:       BestEffort
Node-Selectors:  <none>
Tolerations:     node.kubernetes.io/not-ready:NoExecute for 300s
                 node.kubernetes.io/unreachable:NoExecute for 300s
Events:
  Type     Reason     Age                  From               Message
  ----     ------     ----                 ----               -------
  Normal   Scheduled  2m4s                 default-scheduler  Successfully assigned rook-ceph/rook-ceph-nfs-mynfs-a-5d7d946d68-2zk7l to kubic-2
  Normal   Pulled     12s (x10 over 2m4s)  kubelet, kubic-2   Container image "rook/ceph:master" already present on machine
  Warning  Failed     12s (x10 over 2m4s)  kubelet, kubic-2   Error: failed to mkdir log: mkdir log: read-only file system
```

**Expected behavior:**

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**

Found by QA: https://github.com/sebastian-philipp/test-rook-orchestrator

**Environment**:
* Cloud provider or hardware configuration: Kubic
* Rook version (use `rook version` inside of a Rook Pod): 1.0
* Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): 1.14
* Kubernetes cluster type (e.g. Tectonic, GKE, OpenShift): Kubernetes
* Storage backend status (e.g. for Ceph use `ceph health` in the [Rook Ceph toolbox](https://rook.io/docs/rook/master/ceph-toolbox.html)): See #3138
title: rook-ceph-nfs failed: read-only file system
